backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles with photo storage and Poumai poems CRUD operations with admin-only access control, using authorization mixins and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new actor types for data transformation, removing school management features (students, teachers, fees, library, etc.) and keeping only user profiles and poems.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of Poumai Poems page with filtering, admin CRUD interface, navigation integration, and React Query hooks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files for the school management application.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with navy blue and gold educational theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, Apple-specific configuration, and theme color setup for mobile devices.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, display mode, and categories for Phuba Government High School application.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first strategy for API calls with cache management and offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home and Poumai poems pages, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and includes Layout, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component providing sticky header with school branding, navigation links, authentication button, mobile menu, and footer with social media links; handles login/logout and admin-specific navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and optional student ID; automatically shows on first login and saves profile data to backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles (get, save, isAdmin) and Poumai poems (list, listByCategory, create, update, delete) that interact with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a navy blue and gold educational theme for both light and dark modes, including colors for backgrounds, text, accents, and charts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for announcements page component.
frontend/src/pages/ClassSchedulePage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for class schedule page component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactInboxPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for contact inbox page component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for contact page component.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for events page component.
frontend/src/pages/ExamResultsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for exam results page component.
frontend/src/pages/FeesPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for fees page component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section featuring school logo, title, and description of Poumai cultural heritage poetry collection. Includes feature cards highlighting traditional poems, modern expressions, and cultural preservation.
frontend/src/pages/PoumaiPoemsPage.tsx: Full-featured poem management page with CRUD operations, category filtering, and admin authentication. Includes dialog forms for creating/editing poems with fields for title, author, text, date, category, translation, and cultural context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing. Includes functions for sessionStorage persistence and clearing sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending default settings including OKLCH color system, container queries, typography plugin, custom animations, and sidebar component styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for Phuba Government High School app including homepage, student directory, announcements, schedules, events calendar, PWA manifest, and educational theming.
